includeExamples.description: Include component examples (HTML templates and usage). Extracted from <tui-doc-demo> sections. Adds ~40% to file size.

includeApi.description: Include API documentation tables showing properties, methods, events. Extracted from <table tuiDocAPI> sections. Essential for component understanding.

includeSourceCode.description: Include actual source code files (.ts, .html, .less). Can make files very large. Currently disabled for token efficiency.

includeImportExamples.description: Include 'How to Use' import and template examples. Extracted from examples/import/import.md and template.md files. Provides essential usage information.

includeMarkdownFiles.description: Include standalone markdown documentation files from examples directory. Adds general documentation content.

includeUsageExamples.description: Include detailed usage examples for each component. Extracted from component documentation templates. Disabled to reduce file size.

includeAllExamples.description: Include all available examples per component (if multiple exist). When false, only includes first example.

constants.description: Configurable constants for the generation process
